timeline.content: Let's see if I can get this blog started this time.
So removed Chrome for Edge. Long term will switch to Firefox.
New domain name, Svelte + Github + Netlify. Let's see how it goes.
Simply put, Linux mint is much faster than Windows

github.dev is a revelation to me. On github, browse to the file you want to edit. Change the url from .com  to .dev and an online vscode editor opens up to edit the file. Amazing!! Makes life much simpler for quick edits.

While adding a new column to an existing table,if you want to prefill it with it's default constraint, you can use 'with values' while creating the column.
eg: alter table {tablename} add {newColumn} uniqueidentifier default( newID() ) with values
It's an old saying but breaking things into smaller components makes life so much easier.
I am going to build backend of this blog with Laravel. Let's see how it goes.
So no progress on Laravel yet but upgraded my laptop to double the RAM to 16GB and  250G SSD running Elemetary OS and it's cut the boot time from over 2 mins to less than 20 seconds. :)
Another thing, I used a blank SSD to install, got No bootable device error after installation. The article (https://itsfoss.com/no-bootable-device-found-ubuntu/ ) by Its Foss solved it for me.
Zorin OS is amazing. Been using it for more than 2 months now and no issues for a Linux noob like me.
